title: Unit root test in a threshold autoregression: asymptotic theory and residual-based block bootstrap
abstract:
This paper develops a test of the unit root null hypothesis against a stationary\ud
threshold process+ This testing problem is nonstandard and complicated because\ud
a parameter is unidentified and the process is nonstationary under the null hypothesis+\ud
We derive an asymptotic distribution for the test, which is not pivotal without\ud
simplifying assumptions+ A residual-based block bootstrap is proposed to\ud
calculate the asymptotic p-values+ The asymptotic validity of the bootstrap is\ud
established, and a set of Monte Carlo simulations demonstrates its finite-sample\ud
performance+ In particular, the test exhibits considerable power gains over the\ud
augmented Dickey–Fuller ~ADF! test, which neglects threshold effects
